verses.text: In the days when the judges ruled, there was a famine in the land. And a certain man from Bethlehem in Judah, with his wife and two sons, went to reside in the land of Moab.

verses.text: The man's name was Elimelech, his wife's name was Naomi, and the names of his two sons were Mahlon and Chilion. They were Ephrathites from Bethlehem in Judah, and they entered the land of Moab and settled there.

verses.text: Then Naomi's husband Elimelech died, and she was left with her two sons.

verses.text: When Naomi heard in Moab that the LORD had attended to His people by providing them with food, she and her daughters-in-law prepared to leave the land of Moab.

verses.text: So she left the place where she had been living, she and her two daughters-in-law, and they set out on the road leading back to the land of Judah.
